languages.text: "Конечно с Януса, Ваше Сиятельство, ведь ласераксы водятся только здесь. На Идексе были очень популярны бои кибернетизированных зверей, и Руолдо, став губернатором Тассеры, увез с собой крупную партию. Какая жалость, что он получил назначение на захолустный мир — увы, наше с ним общение из-за этого прервалось. Я не встречалась с Руолдо лично, но наша переписка была истинным удовольствием".

"Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."
languages.original_text: "Конечно с Януса, Ваше Сиятельство, ведь ласераксы водятся только здесь. На Идексе были очень популярны бои кибернетизированных зверей, и Руолдо, став губернатором Тассеры, увез с собой крупную партию. Какая жалость, что он получил назначение на захолустный мир — увы, наше с ним общение из-за этого прервалось. Я не встречалась с Руолдо лично, но наша переписка была истинным удовольствием".

What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

languages.text: 「その通りです、閣下。ラセラックスはここヤヌスにのみ生息しているのです。サイバネティック闘獣はイデックスで非常に人気があり、ルオルドがタッセーラの総督に就任した際、大量のコレクションを持参いたしました。彼があの辺境の惑星に赴任したのは実に残念でした…結果として我々の交信が途絶えてしまったのです。ルオルドには直接お会いしたことはありませんが、彼との文通は真に愉快なものでした」
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです、閣下。ラセラックスはここヤヌスにのみ生息しているのです。サイバネティック闘獣はイデックスで非常に人気があり、ルオルドがタッセーラの総督に就任した際、大量のコレクションを持参いたしました。彼があの辺境の惑星に赴任したのは実に残念でした…結果として我々の交信が途絶えてしまったのです。ルオルドには直接お会いしたことはありませんが、彼との文通は真に愉快なものでした」

languages.text: "Sehr richtig, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denn der Lacerax kommt nur hier auf Janus vor. Kämpfe von kybernetischen Bestien waren auf Idex sehr beliebt, und Ruoldo hat eine große Sammlung mitgenommen, als er Gouverneur von Thassera wurde. Wirklich schade, dass er auf diese unbedeutende Welt musste – unsere Kommunikation brach deswegen leider ab." Ich habe Ruoldo nie persönlich getroffen, aber die Korrespondenz mit ihm war ein wahres Vergnügen."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "Sehr richtig, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, denn der Lacerax kommt nur hier auf Janus vor. Kämpfe von kybernetischen Bestien waren auf Idex sehr beliebt, und Ruoldo hat eine große Sammlung mitgenommen, als er Gouverneur von Thassera wurde. Wirklich schade, dass er auf diese unbedeutende Welt musste – unsere Kommunikation brach deswegen leider ab." Ich habe Ruoldo nie persönlich getroffen, aber die Korrespondenz mit ihm war ein wahres Vergnügen."

languages.text: "Aynen öyle {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Zira laseraks, yalnız Janus'ta bulunur. İdex'te sibernetik canavar dövüşleri pek revaçtaydı, Ruoldo da Thassera Valisi olduğunda geniş koleksiyonunu beraberinde götürdü. Ne yazık ki o ücra dünyaya atanması yüzünden irtibatımız kesildi. Ruoldo'yla yüz yüze hiç tanışmadım fakat yazışmak bile büyük keyifti."
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Zira laseraks yalnız Janus'ta bulunur. İdex'te sibernetik canavar dövüşleri pek revaçtaydı, Ruoldo da Thassera Valisi olduğunda geniş koleksiyonunu beraberinde götürdü. Ne yazık ki o ücra dünyaya atanması yüzünden irtibatımız kesildi. Ruoldo'yla yüz yüze hiç tanışmadım fakat yazışmak bile büyük keyifti."

languages.text: «Efectivamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}, el lacerax solo se encuentra en Janus. Los combates entre bestias cibernéticas eran muy populares en Idex y Ruoldo se llevó numerosos ejemplares cuando fue nombrado gobernador de Thassera. Lástima que lo destinaran a ese mundo retrógrado, porque la comunicación con él se interrumpió. Nunca llegué a conocer personalmente a Ruoldo, pero nuestra correspondencia siempre fue un placer».
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente, mi{mf|lord|lady}, el lacerax solo se encuentra en Janus. Los combates entre bestias cibernéticas eran muy populares en Idex y Ruoldo se llevó numerosos ejemplares cuando fue nombrado gobernador de Thassera. Lástima que lo destinaran a ese mundo retrógrado, porque la comunicación con él se interrumpió. Nunca llegué a conocer personalmente a Ruoldo, pero nuestra correspondencia siempre fue un placer».

languages.text: “完全正确，大人，异虎这种生物只有加努斯才有。生化斗兽活动在艾德克斯非常盛行，当罗尔多被任职为塔瑟拉总督时，他带了许多异虎过去。他被委派到了那个落后的世界，这着实令人遗憾，我们之间的联系也从此断了。尽管我从未见过罗尔多本人，但与他之间的书信往来确实很令人愉悦。”
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."

traits.locale_text: “完全正确，大人，异虎这种生物只有加努斯才有。生化斗兽活动在艾德克斯非常盛行，当罗尔多被任职为塔瑟拉总督时，他带了许多异虎过去。他被委派到了那个落后的世界，这着实令人遗憾，我们之间的联系也从此断了。尽管我从未见过罗尔多本人，但与他之间的书信往来确实很令人愉悦。”

languages.text: « Tout à fait, Votre Seigneurie, le lacérax est endémique de Janus. Les combats de bêtes cybernétiques sont très populaires sur Idex, et Ruoldo a emporté avec lui un vaste cheptel lorsqu'il est devenu gouverneur de Thassera. Quel dommage d'avoir été chargé de cette planète reculée. Hélas, nos communications ont été interrompues à compter de ce jour. Je n'ai jamais rencontré Ruoldo en personne, mais j'ai toujours grandement apprécié nos correspondances. »
languages.original_text: "Quite right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, for the lacerax is found only here on Janus. Cybernetic beast fights were very popular on Idex, and Ruoldo took a large collection with him when he became Governor of Thassera. What a pity he was assigned to that backwater world — alas, communication between us was cut off as a result. I never met Ruoldo in person, but corresponding with him was a true pleasure."
